page.title: 11Shopping in Ingleton.
page.content: There is a sports shop in Ingleton it is a good shop they sell mostly climbing equipment and skiing equipment.There is one electric shop in Ingleton where they sell washers, microwaves and televisions.If your television breaks down you just take it to the shop and they will fix it. The shop is owned by Mr Tooby.There is one clotheswear shop which is owned by Joan Murray.She sells trousers,sweaters,shoes and trainers and a lot of other things.We are lucky because we have a lot of shops for a small village.Many shops cater for the tourists and sell such things as postcards, souvenirs and maps of the area.These shops are often open at weekends and are usually very busy.
